articles.title: Scarlett Johansson's AI row has echoes of Silicon Valley's bad old days - BBC.com

articles.content:

articles.author: Elizabeth Piper, Andrew Macaskill, William James
articles.title: Rishi Sunak calls UK national election for July 4 - Reuters UK
articles.description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak called a national election on Wednesday for July 4, saying Britons would be able to choose their future in a vote his Conservatives are widely expected to lose to the opposition Labour Party after 14 years in power.
